title: Horologist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Mount a special clock at a player's house. Four uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who have a clock are unable to use abilities on odd nights, but can use their abilities up to three times on even nights.
- Players will not know they have a clock. At the end of odd nights, they'll be given a generic ability fail message.
- You only have one clock. Using your ability again will get rid of the current clock and move it to the new target.
- Your ability has last priority.
- You cannot target yourself.

desc:
Post 350
*I don't know how someone can stay in business when their all they do is have one clock they move around.*
